library.description:
Hybrid Mobile App UI Framework for iOS and Material Design with Angular and React Components.

Contains tons of components such as stack navigation, tabs, side menu, buttons, progress bars, switches, form elements and much more.

Made for Cordova/PhoneGap but works just as well in mobile browsers.
library.name: Onsen UI

library.description:
Modular and light-weight selection library.

Compatible with React and jQuery. Can also be used stand-alone.
library.name: Selectivity

library.description: A nestedlistview UI component for React Native apps, this component allows representing a nested array structure in a list of lists.
library.name: react-native-nested-listview

library.description: Gem.js is a view library - a system for building modular and composable web components and styles, as well as a set of extensible web components for building visual user interfaces and styling web applications in pure-javascript.
library.name: Gem.js

library.description: A framework for building admin and dashboard applications. Includes widgets and charts.
library.name: Cx

library.description:
RAN!

React . Apollo (GraphQL) . Next.js Boilerplate

Features

library.name: RAN! BoilerplateRAN!
